benchmark_details.name: Claire French Dialogue Dataset (CFDD)
benchmark_details.overview: CFDD is a corpus containing roughly 160 million words from transcripts and stage plays in French, created to further the development of multilingual, open-source language models. It is designed for NLP tasks requiring understanding and generation of spontaneous, oral French dialogue.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a resource for training language models and developing NLP tasks focused on the understanding and generation of spontaneous French dialogue.

data.source: Various French transcripts and stage plays.
data.annotation: Transcribed and annotated according to transcription standards, with normalizations applied.

methodology.validation: Validation of dataset coverage and structural integrity through various checks.
